pages.text: $(li)Silverfishes are small hostile creatures that can be found hiding in stone-like blocks in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:structures/stronghold)Strongholds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:structures/igloo)Igloos$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l).$(br)$(li)These creatures do not drop any item on death.
